phrases: Which course are you guys going for?
Hina and I are probably going into liberal arts.
Maybe I will go with liberal arts, too...
I have kind of decided, but I will give it some more thought.
Which do you think I should do, Hayato-kun?
You need to give it some serious thought, or you will regret it.
is it true you are going out with Yukinoshita-san?
Who said something irresponsible like that?
My Teen Romantic Comedy SNAFU TOO!
Someone saw them together over winter break!
Yeah, it seems like the real deal, does not it?
What is wrong with where I am?
So your birthday is January 3rd, Yukinoshita-senpai?
By the way, mine is April 16th, Senpai.
Why are you even here, anyway?
There is actually a little favor I wanted to ask.
Yukinoshita-senpai, are you really going out with Hayama-senpai?
I thought there was no way it could be true!
Remember when you went out the other day?
Seems like someone saw that and got the wrong idea.
The petty suspicions of a lowlife.
They say a rumor only lasts 49 days, right?
any rumors specifically about him before, weirdly enough.
He is, like, everybody's Hayama Hayato.
So since this rumor came up,
there are more people trying to mess with him.
Well, like girls confessing to him,
or if they do not go that far, they try to appeal to him by just checking.
Are you going out with anyone
That is what I am talking about.
Th-That is just an issue of how you say it!
Well, I cannot say that would not appeal to me, yes.
In fact, it sure as hell did.
Why are not you saying anything?
I understand what is going on with Hayama.
Those really do look great on you!
Did you always wear glasses, Senpai?
Maybe I should try a pair of those, too.
You do not look at the computer that much.
I look at it all the time!
Yukinon, let me see it, too!
How is everyone deciding whether to pick liberal arts or sciences?
I want to talk to you.
Well, I appreciate your help with the future plans counseling sessions.
No one told us about that...
So, what did you want to talk about?
Is something going on with you and Hayato?
We have known each other since we were young.
Would lying benefit me in any way?
That sort of thing has always annoyed me.
Why do you have to talk like that?
I really hate that about y
I already explained that to you before.
They just bumped into each other...
If that is all it was, Hayato would not be so bothered by it.
Even if it is not now,
Even if something did happen, and I told you all about it,
Would you, and everyone else, believe it?
Is there something else you would like to say?
I am used to this sort of thing.
As long as the people closest to me understand, that is enough.
The thing about the people closest to you.
That is what I want to be.
How is everyone deciding whether to pick liberal arts or sciences?
What you want to know is not what happened a long time ago, is it?
thought it would be nice if we could be together a little longer...
Even I realize this is weird, but...
I do not know anything else...
It is not weird at all.
It is only natural to want to stay together.
what future course Hayama will take, and what he will do beyond that.
And she knows things cannot stay the way they are now...
But that just makes her want to stay close to him all the more.
Does not the fact that he will not tell anyone
mean that he does not want anyone to know?
He might not like being asked.
Do you still want to know?
It is the only choice I have.
I will do something about it.
You guys can go on home.
But it does not feel right leaving it all to you.
Nah, it will be easier to ask him alone.
Sorry to leave it all to you.
Work is work, cannot help that.
I never expected to hear that from you.
Did someone ask you to ask me?
Then can I ask you a favor, too?
Could you stop being so intrusive?
If I said something contrary like that, what would you do?
I would cross that bridge when the time came.
I will leave the answer to your imagination.
Since I have been playing tennis for so long,
I guess I would like something related to that.
Cannot you get a recommendation or something, then?
Only a precious few get those.
At our school, only someone like Hayama-kun would have a chance.
I just did not know you did captain-ish stuff like that.
I am doing a pretty solid job, right?
I might be a little unreliable, though.
Nah, I could rely on you.
Not that I would know yet, of course...
But I am pretty sure I could.
What do you want us to do?
We have to rearrange all this stuff.
Some of the alumni came to help.
Nee-san, there is something I want to ask you.
Do not worry, it is not that you are weak.
And I thought you could handle things on your own now.
Here you are relying on others again.
That was cute when you were little, but now...
Think about it on your own.
It is not often you get a chance to walk home with a gorgeous older girl like this.
Have you heard which curriculum Yukino-chan wants to go into?
Well, I guess she would not volunteer the information.
Make sure you ask her, okay, Hikigaya-kun?
We will check each other's answers.
I do not think you would call that checking each other's answers.
Do not sweat the little details!
By the way, did you try asking Hayato directly?
He said some stuff, but would not tell me.
Hayato was hoping for it, too...
For someone to find him... maybe?
I am not the good guy you think I am.
Good luck going for your second consecutive win!
And good luck to you, too, Senpai!
Damn, I am glad I ride a bike to school!
Otherwise, there is no way I could run this long!
I am impressed you are keeping up.
As long as I do not think about pacing myself, it is not impossible.
I wonder how people feel as they approach a halfway point in a trial.
Do they despair at the knowledge that half the trial still remains?
Or do they feel relieved to have made it halfway through?
Most would probably feel one of the two.
And both of those emotions create openings in people's hearts.
That is why I have pushed myself this far.
Was Miura handy for keeping girls away?
Did you pick liberal arts or sciences?
Then let me put it another way.
I do not know which one you had chosen,
and I do not really care.
But it can still be changed, so change it!
That is the only way to meet your condition!
You told me to stop being intrusive, right?
you want to stop being the Hayama Hayato everyone wants!
If you go with sciences, there will not be as many people,
and there are not many girls.
You can put distance between you and the problems intruding in your life.
Plus, if your choice does not match theirs,
they will all accept it and drift away from you.
If it ends naturally, nobody gets hurt,
and you will not have to betray anyone's expectations.
We never could have been friends.
I wanted us to be equals,
so I could accept losing to you.
So I will not do as you say.
Sorry for blocking your second consecutive win.
I do not want to lose to you.
I knew for sure you would win!
I was able to finish the race thanks to all of your support.
A round of applause for Hayama-senpai!
I do not need to announce who placed after him, right?
So he was not really going out with Yukinoshita-san?
I guess rumors are just rumors.
I stopped to rest for a bit, and they made me forfeit.
You could have had them treat it out there.
No one was there by the time I crossed the finish line.
I guess it was bad timing.
Or maybe it is your luck that was bad.
A lot of me is bad.
Looks like your hands do not work so well, either.
Uh, I can do this much by myself.
It is to kill the germs.
It only makes sense that it would be effective on you.
Would you stop treating me like a germ?
It looked like you were running with Hayama-kun.
If nothing else, he is not going into sciences.
That is a funny way to put it.
It is not a big deal.
Can I ask which course you are going into?
That is the first time you have asked me a question like that.
For what it is worth, I will be going into liberal arts.
For the time being, we will all stay together.
Well, in terms of categories, I guess.
Okay, I am going to head back to the classroom.
Yukinon, sorry I took so long.
Yumiko and the gang are going to the after-party.
Sorry for the trouble that crazy rumor caused you.
It did not particularly trouble me.
I am grateful that you were concerned for me.
I do not know about that.
It is just that so many things are different from back then.
And they are totally cooked whole!
She really has changed a bit.
It looks like she is not chasing Haruno-san's shadow anymore.
But it is no more than that.
Well, if you do not know, I guess that is fine.
There is something I forgot to tell you.
Things like moving up to the next grade
or to college do not reset relationships.
Yes, that totally does reset them.
You and I are not the same.
Then why would not you tell anyone which course you are going into?
If I chose something because I had no other choice,
I could not call it my own decision.
There is something I forgot to tell you.
I do not like you, either.
You might be the first person who ever said that to my face.
I believe that is the best way to go.
Hayama Hayato Always Responds to Everyone is Expectations.
12 Still, The Thing He Seeks Is Out of Reach, And He Continues to Mistake What is Real.
Then maybe I will do that, too.
Are you sure you should make that decision so easily?
There is nothing I particularly want to do.
I can put off starting college, but this does not work that way.
It is going to be tough to put up with him.
I do not need to hear that from you, Hikio.
I think all of him is cool, including his troublesome side.
It could have been that much simpler...
